summary: Contoso Wireless offers a great TV product that includes access to over 500 channels and on-demand content, advanced cloud DVR technology for recording and storing shows, 24/7 customer service, easy switching options with no penalty or early termination fees, and free installation for customers who choose the 12-month commitment plan. The cost of the service is $49.99 per month plus taxes and fees, and there is an installation fee of $99 for customers who choose the month-to-month plan.
